meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of a cenobite or cenobites.
meanings.sent1: The cenobitic lifestyle of the monks involved communal living and shared responsibilities.
meanings.sent2: The cenobitic monks worked together in harmony to maintain their monastery.
meanings.sent3: In the cenobitic community, even the chores became a bonding experience.
meanings.sent4: The cenobitic spirit among the monks created a strong sense of unity and cooperation.
meanings.sent5: The vivid image of the cenobitic monks praying together left a lasting impression on the visitors.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to a monastic community living together.
meanings.sent1: The cenobitic monks shared meals and prayers in their communal hall.
meanings.sent2: Living in a cenobitic setting allowed the monks to support each other in their spiritual journey.
meanings.sent3: The cenobitic lifestyle made mundane tasks more enjoyable through shared laughter.
meanings.sent4: The monastery's cenobitic atmosphere fostered a sense of belonging and purpose.
meanings.sent5: The serene beauty of the cenobitic gardens brought peace to all who visited.
